name: Demonzone
description:
Get it for free as part of the Reactor: https://www.patreon.com/Clickteam

You have entered the Demonzone. Now, guard yourself for true! Monsters roam looking for the next victim, will that be you? Pick up a weapon and fight them off as you find the key to dive deeper into the zone...

This 3d engine uses nothing more than standard Fusion objects and a bit of math. After playing in the Demonzone open the MFA and peruse the events and learn how to make your own pseudo 3d dungeon game. Multiple mfa examples included as well as level editor source.

Source code requires Clickteam Fusion 2.5
